text: HubSpot needs to buy this company: <https://fireflies.ai/>

Can we have another column choice be added to the blog dashboard. I know right now you have a choice of 2 of the 4 columns, but having a third would be awesome because then you can have author, last updated, and date created. Or even simply throwing the author name next tot he status of the blog like:
```
TITLE
Author: XYZ  - STATUS
```
